annotations.description: A basic OC template for a Spring Petclinic deploy environment.

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory the Rails container can use.

parameters.name: APPLICATION_DOMAIN
parameters.description: The exposed hostname that will route to the Rails service, if left blank a value will be defaulted.
